Package TransLib

Interface RemoteControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteController
public interface RemoteControllerInterface
extends Remote
RemoteControllerInterface -- defines the remote callback functions that will provide APIs for a MessageHandling interface for your Raft node
